metadata.name: Dua on sighting new Ramadhan Moon

arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْ شَهْرِنَا هٰذَا
وَاصْرِفْ عَنَّا ضُرَّهُ وَشَرَّهُ وَبَلاءَهُ وَفِتْنَتَهُ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
Your and my Lord is Allah; the Lord of the worlds.
O Allah: (please do] cause this crescent to carry with it for us security and faith
And expedition to whatever You love and please.
O Allah: (please do] bless us in this month,
And confer upon us with its goodness and aid,
And save us from its harm, evil, ordeals, and sedition.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma bārik lanā fī shahrinā hādhā
